featured.text: What do we learn from this passage? (A) Human beings depend emotionally on animals.
Only a few people worked with the whales so that they would not become too accustomed to human beings.
A lot of ancient civilizations, __(37)__ the Egyptians, Hindus, Greeks, and Mayans, have left writings and __(38)__ which indicate contacts with superior beings “from the stars.”
Despite the economic and environmental hurdles, desalination is becoming increasingly attractive as human beings are using up fresh water from other sources.

other.text: Human beings, too, 37 special devices to protect 38 .
We human beings may live without clothes, but food and air are ______ to our life.
We human beings need to love and be loved, and this will come from our relationship with others.

definition.zh_def: 存在；生存；生命的狀態或本質
definition.en_def: The state or quality of having existence; the nature of life.
definition.example: Being kind to others can make a big difference.
